document.full_text: minnesota governor mark dayton on wednesday vetoed republican-led laws aimed at restricting abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in medical emergencies, and a ban on public funding of abortions.
document.title: minnesota governor vetoes 20-week abortion law
lines_and_colors: minnesota governor mark dayton on wednesday vetoed republican-led laws aimed at restricting abortions after 20 weeks of pregnancy except in medical emergencies, and a ban on public funding of abortions.
